data.eml:eml: Some shallow water octocorals (Coelenterata: Anthozoa) of the Persian Gulf

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Namin, Samimi, Ofwegen, Van (2009): Some shallow water octocorals (Coelenterata: Anthozoa) of the Persian Gulf. Zootaxa 2058: 1-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.186743
